text: <@U026PHQ3J>: any more info to provide gkat for legal review re: how we will use Earth images (other than weâ€™ll access + use but not store)?
ohhh for earth images, we're not actually storing user location at all

I'm wondering if this should be filed as low priority in Trello: when you choose Trends as your background and set the color scheme to black the text turns black too for readability since it typically lies in the white area of the graph. *however* when you set the color scheme to random and do some double-tapping until you get to a black trend line then for some reason the text is always white which makes readability a little difficult
thanks <@U1J4BQX7G>  - yes, go ahead and log that. It's a known issue but certainly worth capturing in trello for when we refine/make this real
(just check first to make sure it's not already accounted for on the Basil/3PR trello board)
Random wasn't a requested feature so I just dumped that in there so people could get a feel for all of the gradients
